Name: Mini Moves: Among Stars
About the game: Astronauts beyond the stars we know are looking for a path, and you will help them to find it. Mini Moves: Among Stars is a point and click puzzle game. You will solve puzzles to put all the astronauts in the right place with limited moves and other new challenges according with your progress. FEATURES Simple Controls 40 levels Relaxing graphics and sounds
